mapper.select: SELECT exhibitNum,exhibitName,TO_CHAR(exhibitStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitStart,content,host,supervise,admitStart,admitEnd,ratingName, TO_CHAR(exhibitEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitEnd, hallName, exHallLocate, exProfileImage,genre FROM EXHIBIT e JOIN exhibitHall h ON e.hallNum=h.hallNum JOIN rating h ON e.ratingNum=h.ratingNum WHERE exhibitNum=#{num}
SELECT audience||' '||exprice priceString FROM EXHIBITprice ep JOIN AUDIENCELEVEL al ON ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM = al.AUDIENCELEVELNUM WHERE ep.exhibitNum=1 ORDER BY ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE exhibit SET content=#{content} WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exhibitInterest WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM exhibitInterest WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} AND userId=#{userId}
SELECT hallName, hallNum, exHallLocate, exHallImage FROM exhibitHall WHERE hallNum=#{num}
